description: MainActivity.kt is the main source file of a Kotlin-based Android application, implementing the app's activity, theme, and navigation logic for a notes management app using Jetpack Compose.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity serving as the entry point of the app, setting up the content view with Compose.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity and sets the Compose content to the OceanProfessionalNotesApp.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Defines the app's Material theme using a custom color scheme.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalNotesApp
methods.description: Main composable function managing navigation, theme, and repository for the notes app.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Creates the top app bar with dynamic titles and navigation icons based on the screen.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Displays a list of notes, loading state, and empty state when no notes are present.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Displays an individual note summary in a card format.

methods.name: CreateEditScreen
methods.description: Handles creating or editing a note with input validation.

methods.name: ViewNoteScreen
methods.description: Displays detailed view of a selected note with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Displays a message when there are no notes.
